Admission

Application form for Diploma Program

At Level Up College, we are committed to helping you achieve your academic and personal goals. Our admissions process is designed to guide you step-by-step as you take the first step toward becoming a part of our vibrant community.

Why Choose Level Up Academy?

  • Empowered Youth as Quality Human Resources: Envisioning empowered youth in Myanmar as quality human resources for positive change of communities in different regions.
  • Purpose of Level Up Academy: Creating quality educational opportunities and providing practical learning experiences.
  • Hands-On Learning and Training: Education through experiential methods.
  • Core Values: Promoting Diversity, Equity, Quality and Sustainability.
  • Focus Area: Supporting young people in various situations in Karenni State.

Application Timeline

  • September 1, Date for application availability.
    October 31 Deadline for application submission.
  • Applications can be obtained through the “Level Up College-Loikaw” Facebook Page via the provided application. link. Level Up College Facebook
  • Only students who successfully pass the entrance examination will be eligible to participate in an in-person interview.
  • Applicants must attend the entrance examination and interview in person on the specified dates at the designated locations chosen in their application.

Requirement

  • Applicants must be at least 18 years of age.
  • A relevant educational background, equivalent to a university degree, is essential.
  • Priority will be given to individuals with limited access to higher education opportunities.
  • Applicants must demonstrate perseverance and the ability to dedicate time to service-learning activities.
  • A strong enthusiasm for and commitment to community development is highly desirable.

Track Your Application

  • November 6-10: Notification for Entrance Exam and Interview
  • November 5–6: Entrance Exam to be held at See Bu.
  • November 7: Entrance Exam to be conducted at two locations in Demoso.
  • November 14-15: Announcement date for the list of written exam passers.
  • November 18- 19: Interview date (See Bu).
  • November 20 - 21: Interview date (Demoso).
  • December 6: Notification to selected candidates.
  • December 15: Deadline for confirmation of attendance.
  • January 13, 2025: Training start date.

Receive your Offer

  • Successful applicants will receive an admission email with detailed instructions on enrollment.
Personal Information

Residential Support

At Level Up Academy, we offer two types of residential support to assist our students during their learning journey: partial support and full support. Partial support provides financial assistance to help cover a portion of the student’s living expenses throughout their academic period. Full support, on the other hand, covers both accommodation and meals, ensuring students can fully focus on their studies without financial concerns. All students selected to attend Level Up Academy are eligible to apply for support; however, support is granted for a fixed period of six months. To continue receiving assistance, students must reapply at the end of each support period.

Two types of Residential Support

Full Support

Level Up College

Level Up College is a community-based, non-profit higher education institution empowering youth from diverse backgrounds, especially those from marginalized communities and conflict-affected areas in Kayah (Karenni) State and the nearby region..
